title: Interstate Infrastructure
prompt: A rural county road stretching toward the horizon at golden hour, with weathered fence lines dividing farmland, a distant grain elevator, and a small clinic or community building visible but not prominentâ€”shot from a low angle to emphasize the expanse and interconnectedness of the landscape, with muted greens and earth tones. The composition should convey the scale of rural territory while suggesting the invisible governance lines that fragment it, using depth of field to show how distant locations feel both connected and isolated. Documentary photography style with natural, flat lighting.
